- Sorry I snapped at you. - It's okay. I've never been chased by a killer before.

And he's being hunted by every law enforcement agency in the city.
Uh, what was that movie about the guy with one arm who was being chased around by everybody?
I told myself I was being chased by the dead guy and did a personal best.
